titles.title: A concurrent resolution to correct the enrollment of H. R. 1268.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Lewis (CA) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. Con. Res. 31.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/11/2005--Passed House without amendment. Authorizes and directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to correct the enrollment of H.R. 1268 (Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act for Defense, the Global War on Terror, and Tsunami Relief, 2005) to authorize up to 50,000 unused FY2001-FY2004 employment-based visas for foreign nurses.
